reviews.review: Без понятия, про какие баги многие говорят - никаких патчей не ставил - прошёл до конца два раза.

Orijinal Half Life'ın görüntü olarak daha gelişmişi. Tek sıkıntısı bu geliştirmelerle beraber orijinal oyunda olmayan birkaç tane bug'a sahip olmuş. Genelde grafik ile alakalı bug'lar. Eğer Half Life'ı hiç oynamadıysanız kesinlikle oynamanız gereken bir oyun. Aşırı şiddetle tavsiye edilir.
Eu Recomendaria mas o jogo tem varios bugs e bugs até engraçados E Bem Legais Jogo Bom
mal juego si lo quieres solo para el gmod te recomiendo que jueges al original o si quieres que este actualizado en graficos comprate black mesa
Лучший симулятор багов на движке Source

Gra half-life na nowym silniku. Niektóre tekstury są lepsze ale silnik source ma dużo błędów. Przedstawiam wady i zalety wersji na silnik source: zalety: można pobrać spolszczenie, żeby rozumieć fabułę lub włączyć po prostu angielskie napisy, żeby lepiej rozumieć po angielsku (w pierwotnej wersji half-life'a nie dało się włączyć nawet angielskich napisów). Wad jest dużo. Na levelu z  taśmami są tak zepsute tekstury, że gra nie jest do przejścia. Przeszedłem ten level na farcie. Wadą silnika source są autosave'y. Niektórych po prostu nie da się wczytać (sytuacja z autosavami występowała również w hl2). Po za tym gra jest genialna. Jeśli potrzebujecie angielskich napisów lub spolszczenia polecam zakupić tą grę.
O game que revolucionou a era dos games, se você se considerar um jogador, Half Life é indispensável na sua coleção de melhores games, pois esse um dos mais magníficos já feitos na história!

Half-Life Source is a game with many flaws that appeared in it but is still a good game to relive the original. Of my understanding of this it is supposed to be a remake of the original Half-Life but on the source engine. But valve left many bugs in the game making people hate on it. I think it is a good game I enjoyed it very much I also made videos of it also from beginning to end. If you do not want to play this game because of the bugs, then go get Black Mesa a Half-Life fan game on steam.

Why I bought Half life: Source 
-Garry's Mod Content 
-All the levels are unlocked

This is one of the glitchiest games I've ever played. You're much better off playing the original Half-Life, or Black Mesa if you want to play an actually good remake. The only thing I really like about this version is the water graphics. Man, that's some good-looking water.

Thinking about playing half life for the first time? Well have fun but please do not buy this port, just get the original. The only thing this port has is ragdolls, better water affects, and bugs, a lot of bugs. Everything is way to shiny, the crowbar sounds are messed up the mp5 is super inaccurate and the balancing of the weapon is all messed up, a scientist floats above a chair, a skybox smears, and when riding a conveyer belt you will enter some terrible colorful rainbow world. Don't waste 37 hours on this port like I did. Buy the original.

NASIL İNDİRİLİR:Mod dosyalarını indirdikten sonra içinden çıkarıp Yerel Disk (C:)>Program Dosyaları veya Program Files>Steam>steamapps>sourcemods dosyasına yapıştırın. Steam'i yeniden başlatıp Oyunu indirin. İndirme tamamdır.

I thought people where over exaggerating how bad this was. well... they were to an extent, but you are paying for a worse version of Half-Life 1.

i never had or noticed any issues with this port; but i'm just sharing my honest anecdote in interest of keeping the reviews balanced. judging by the other reviews you'll probably not be as lucky. that's not to mention all the subjective changes to a game that used to have a cohesive artstyle; even if you don't run into any glitches you would probably prefer or at least not care about the differences if you played the original goldsource version.

but really; i never had any issues. i thought the lighting and water effects of the source engine had better gameplay elements with their improved graphics not getting in the way; but they certainly don't fit the game. but i'm just one guy; its probably better to just not test your luck with the gamebreaking bugs and play the original with the HD models disabled as it was intended to be played.

Лучшая часть. Хорошая графика, текстуры хорошо проработаны, в отличие от Black Mesa в ней нет никакого васянства и отсебятчины... Игру незаслуженно ругают, что очень жаль. Игра хоть и имеет проблемы, но эти проблемы не глобальные. Учёный левитирует на стуле? И? Это как-то мешает игре? Оружие покрыто лаком? И-И-И? Это как-то мешает играть? Какие-то проблемы с изображением? У меня лично никаких проблем не было. У кого проблемы с изображением, то хочу сказать: это тоже не критично. Видеокарта не сгорит, а глюки быстро пропадают. Вертолётик имеет кривой хитбокс? И-И-И? Лично мне не понравился вертолёт в оригинальной Half-life. Один выстрел из пушки - всё. Вертолёт сбит. А здесь вертолёт из-за невозможности его сбить действительно пугает. Если вы не можете сбить вертолёт, то просто пробегите момент с ним. Лучшая часть Half-life. Выкручив настройки на максимум игру невозможно будет отличить от Black Mesa. Приобретите игру, не слушая сторонние крики недовольства. (Кстати, недовольство со стороны большинства по отношению к игре вызвал STALKERSOS, то есть большинство людей просто приняло чужое мнение одного)
Всегда первая часть нравилась намного больше второй,чем то она притягивает меня.Советую всем,ибо это настоящая классика,в которую можно играть в любое время

I do like HL:S for what it does. The problem is that it doesn't do the advancements it was supposed to make "properly", bordering on "at all". Between this and Goldsource, I'd choose Goldsource 99.9% of the time. This simply isn't representative of the quality and value of the original game. But, consider picking this up after you've finished the original or if you want to use the maps with Gmod.

Ufff!! Artık Dayanmıyorum.Allah Belanı Versin Valve.Bize Half Life diye Bozuk Life sunmuşsun.Türlüü türlü hatalar var.
Bilim adamlarından birisi,sandalyede değil,havada oturuyor.
Asansör ara sıra sıkışıp duruyor.
Yapay zeka rezaletin ötesi.O efsanevi diyalogları yaşamadım.
Fizikler put gibi hareketsiz.
Hitbox'lar %70 daha geniş.Yeraltındayım.Bir yere giriyorum.Orası Houndeye denen yaratıklarla dolu.Saldırmaya hazırlanıyorlar.Yeraltına yeniden iniyorum.Genelde yerden şok dalgaları yayan Houndeyelar,altlarında olan ben birden beni yere serdiler.Muhteşem bir firmasın Valve.
Bir yere girdiğimde ve ışığı açtığımda her yer glitch oluyor.Adamın dibisin Valve.
Sonuç:62/100:Genelde bu skor ile bir oyunu öneririm ancak HL:Source saçma sapan glitchler ve berbat optimizasyonu ile asla önermeyeceğim oyunlardan birisi.18 TL veren kafama edeyim.
